name: Student Competitions AB
overview:
Studentcompetitions.com is a website which aggregates all the worldâ€™s global competitions for students, and offer a competition based communication platform for companies and organizations that wants to communicate with students globally.

There are numerous different types of competitions, such as business plan competitions, design competitions, case competitions, science competitions etc. We offer companies to create competitions for open innovation, collecting ideas and for recruitment purposes and market them to students worldwide through the website.

The user base consist of top students from more than 190 countries who are savvy in the English language, who are looking for global opportunities and challenges which can enrich their time at University, present career opportunities and open doors to global opportunities, which they would otherwise not know about.

Competitions can also be used as a tool for crowdsourcing ideas from students. Studentcompetitions.com use different competition formats to gather market intelligence from different regions and collect ideas, insights and make students solve problems for companies through competitions.
